member.name: T:NHibernate.Logging.CommonLogging.CommonLoggingLoggerFactory
member.summary:
Implementation of the interface to allow the usage of Common.Logging 2.0 with the NHibernate logging infrastructure.
To use this logger factory with NHibernate add the following to your App/Web.config:
<appSettings> <add key="nhibernate-logger" value="NHibernate.Logging.CommonLogging.CommonLoggingLoggerFactory, NHibernate.Logging.CommonLogging"/> </appSettings>
